title: My pool party taric disappear!?
body: one day i log in into league and i went in game.... When i choose my main TARIC and went to skins my pool party taric wasnt there... i went to the gifting hystory and he was there but i cant pic him in champ select.... Thet skin i get from my friend for a birthay...... i am relly sad now.. i waant to know how i can get back this cool skin..... AND SORRY FOR MY BAD ENGLISH I AM FROM CROATIA....

replies.body: Riot be stealing this man's shirtless hunk!

Hey matebaric69! 

No need to apologize, I totally get what you're describing, and I *think* I have an idea as to why you're missing this skin.

If you're seeing that Pool Party Taric was removed, its not usually due to an error regarding the account.  Typically, this content is removed due an instance such as a player purchases RP and gifts content with it, and subsequently issues a chargeback for the money spent on that RP, we will remove that content.

Basically, your friend may have disputed the charge for the RP he used to get you the skin, and got a refund. If that's the case, Pool Party Taric was then no longer paid for, which is why the content is no longer on your account. 

If you believe that content you have received on your account has gone missing and is not due to what I've described above, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  We can look into your account and investigate further!
